mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userTb (user_id, user_pw, email, user_name, user_nick, birth, address, address_detail, phone, profile, join_date, user_status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{email}, #{userName}, #{userNick}, #{birth}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{phone}, #{profile}, SYSDATE, #{userStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE userTb SET user_pw = #{userPw}, birth = #{birth}, address = #{address}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}, phone = #{phone}, profile = #{profile} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
